title: Altar Set, ca. 1920
medium:
Medium: linen
Technique: plain weave with cut work and embroidery
creditline: Gift of Scuola d' Industrie Italiane in New York through Florence Colgate Speranza
description: An altar set of four pieces with embroidery in similar designs of off white-on-off white.  Embroidery and cut-work forms a grid of squares with crosses in the centers.

tombstone.epitaph:
